mapper.update:
update t_user
id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
access_token = #{accessToken,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
display_name = #{displayName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
channel = #{channel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
channel_account = #{channelAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
balance = #{balance,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
extract_balance = #{extractBalance,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
active_days = #{activeDays,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sum_recharge = #{sumRecharge,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
where account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_user set id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, access_token = #{accessToken,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, display_name = #{displayName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, channel = #{channel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, channel_account = #{channelAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, balance = #{balance,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, extract_balance = #{extractBalance,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, active_days = #{activeDays,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sum_recharge = #{sumRecharge,jdbcType=DOUBLE} where account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_user set extract_balance = extract_balance - #{reduce,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, balance = balance + #{reduce,jdbcType=DOUBLE} where account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and extract_balance >= #{reduce,jdbcType=DOUBLE}
mapper.select: select count(*) from t_user where channel = #{channel,jdbcType=INTEGER} and mobile is not null and mobile!=""
select sum(sum_recharge) from t_user where channel = #{channel,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select sum(sum_withdraw) from t_user where channel = #{channel,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select sum(balance) from t_user where channel = #{channel,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select sum(extract_balance) from t_user where channel = #{channel,jdbcType=INTEGER}
